title: Zarah Sultana – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Suella Braverman
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Zarah Sultana, the Labour MP for Coventry South, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content:
Good riddance Suella Braverman.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

It looks like you won’t get to live your twisted “dream” of deporting refugees to Rwanda.
